# ⚙️ Core Modules

Welcome to the NULS AI Core Modules documentation! This section provides comprehensive technical documentation for developers who want to understand the core architecture and modules of the NULS AI blockchain platform.

# 🎯 What You'll Learn

The Core Modules documentation covers the technical architecture, design documents, and implementation guides for all core modules of the NULS AI platform, helping you understand the underlying technology and contribute to the platform's development.

# 🚀 Quick Start

# For New Developers

If you're new to NULS AI architecture, start with these essential guides:

  1. Account Module - Understand account management and design
  2. Transaction Module - Learn about transaction processing
  3. Block Module - Understand block structure and validation

# For Experienced Developers

If you're already familiar with blockchain architecture:

  1. Consensus Module - Deep dive into consensus mechanisms
  2. Network Module - Understand network communication
  3. Smart Contract Module - Learn about smart contract architecture

# 📖 Module Categories

# 🏗️ Design Documents

Core module design specifications:

  • Account Module - Account management design and architecture
  • Address Module - Address generation and validation design
  • Block Module - Block structure and validation design
  • Chain Manager - Chain management and coordination design
  • Consensus Module - Consensus mechanism design
  • Cross-Chain Module - Cross-chain communication design
  • Ledger Module - Ledger and state management design
  • Network Module - Network communication design
  • Protocol Update - Protocol upgrade mechanisms
  • Public Service - Public service design
  • Smart Contract - Smart contract architecture design
  • Transaction Module - Transaction processing design

# 📋 Implementation Guides

Technical implementation details:

  • Account Implementation - Account module implementation guide
  • Block Implementation - Block module implementation guide
  • Chain Manager Implementation - Chain manager implementation
  • Consensus Implementation - Consensus module implementation
  • Cross-Chain Implementation - Cross-chain module implementation
  • Ledger Implementation - Ledger module implementation
  • Network Implementation - Network module implementation
  • Public Service Implementation - Public service implementation
  • Smart Contract Implementation - Smart contract implementation
  • Transaction Implementation - Transaction module implementation

# 🔧 System Tools

Development and system tools:

  • Offline Assembly - Offline transaction assembly tools

# 🎯 Developer Roles

# 🔬 Core Developers

Focus: Core module development and maintenance

  • Start with Account Module
  • Learn Transaction Module
  • Master Consensus Module

# 🏗️ System Architects

Focus: System architecture and design

  • Begin with Chain Manager
  • Study Network Module
  • Explore Cross-Chain Module

# 🔧 Module Developers

Focus: Custom module development

  • Learn Module Design
  • Understand Implementation Guides
  • Master System Tools

# 🔧 Technical Stack

# Core Technologies

  • Java - Primary development language
  • Spring Framework - Application framework
  • Netty - Network communication framework
  • RocksDB - Data storage engine

# Development Tools

  • Maven - Build and dependency management
  • JUnit - Unit testing framework
  • Git - Version control system
  • Docker - Containerization

# Architecture Components

  • Module Framework - Modular architecture framework
  • Event System - Inter-module communication
  • State Management - Distributed state management
  • Consensus Engine - Consensus mechanism implementation

# 📚 Learning Path

# Beginner Path (1-2 months)

  1. Month 1: Core concepts

    • Read Account Module
    • Study Transaction Module
    • Understand Block Module

  2. Month 2: Advanced modules

    • Learn Consensus Module
    • Master Network Module
    • Explore Smart Contract Module

# Intermediate Path (2-3 months)

  1. Month 1: Implementation details

    • Study Implementation Guides
    • Learn System Tools
    • Understand Protocol Update

  2. Month 2-3: Advanced architecture

    • Master Cross-Chain Module
    • Learn Chain Manager
    • Understand Ledger Module

# Advanced Path (3-6 months)

  1. Month 1-3: Deep dive

    • Custom module development
    • Protocol extensions
    • Performance optimization

  2. Month 4-6: Contribution

    • Code contribution
    • Architecture improvements
    • Community leadership
